conclusion: The gun fires a bullet every Δt₀ time interval.
The speed of each bullet relative to the ground remains constant at v₀.
The first bullet travels a distance s₁ = v₀Δt₀ during the time interval Δt₀.
Cart A is moving to the left with a speed of v₁.
During the time interval Δt₀, the displacement of the gun is s₂ = v₁Δt₀.
The position where the second bullet is fired is v₁Δt₀ to the left of where the first bullet was fired.
The distance between two adjacent bullets in the air is s = s₁ + s₂.
The distance between two adjacent bullets in the air is s = (v₀ + v₁)Δt₀.
